de.fuberlin.panda.metadata.result.fusion.administrative

Class LicenseDescription

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.fuberlin.panda.metadata.result.fusion.administrative.LicenseDescription

  • public class LicenseDescription
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents the in memory presentation of the relevant information regarding the metadata fusing of licenses. Therefore it holds some String attributes which represent the most restrictive permission properties at the current time.
    Since:
    25.03.2014
    Author:
    Sebastian Schulz
    See Also:
    LicenseDescription(), #loadProperties(String), setReusePermissions(String), setDistributePermissions(String), setEditPermissions(String), setAttributionRestrictions(String), setSubjectedLicenses(String), setAttributes(), updateAttributes(LicenseDescription), updateReusePermission(String), updateDistributePermission(String), updateEditPermission(String), updateAttributionRestriction(String), updateSubjectedLicenses(ArrayList)

    • Method Detail

      • loadProperties

        private void loadProperties(java.lang.String filePath,
                  boolean shouldSetDefaultAttributes)
        This method creates an InputStream to the given fileName and tries to load the properties with calling the set methods.
        Parameters:
        filePath - - a String object which represents the filePath.
        shouldSetDefaultAttributes - - a boolean value which represents if hard coded default attributes should be set.

      • setReusePermissions

        private void setReusePermissions(java.lang.String property)
        This method adds the possible reuse permissions given by the property to the reusePermissionsList. If this property could not be read hard coded values are used to fill the list.
        Parameters:
        property - - a comma separated String representation all possible permissions.

      • setDistributePermissions

        private void setDistributePermissions(java.lang.String property)
        This method adds the possible distribute permissions given by the property to the distributePermissionsList. If this property could not be read hard coded values are used to fill the list.
        Parameters:
        property - - a comma separated String representation all possible permissions.

      • setEditPermissions

        private void setEditPermissions(java.lang.String property)
        This method adds the possible edit permissions given by the property to the editPermissionsList. If this property could not be read hard coded values are used to fill the list.
        Parameters:
        property - - a comma separated String representation all possible permissions.

      • setAttributionRestrictions

        private void setAttributionRestrictions(java.lang.String property)
        This method adds the possible attribution restriction given by the property to the attributionRestrictionsList. If this property could not be read hard coded values are used to fill the list.
        Parameters:
        property - - a comma separated String representation all possible permissions.

      • setSubjectedLicenses

        private void setSubjectedLicenses(java.lang.String property)
        This method adds the addicted licenses given by the property to the addictedLicenses List. If this property could not be read the list stays empty.
        Parameters:
        property - - a comma separated String representation all possible permissions.

      • setAttributes

        private void setAttributes()
        This method sets all attributes to the least restrictive values which are hold at the beginning of each List. In case this value is the only value in the list the specific flag is set to true.

      • getName

        public java.lang.String getName()

      • getInvolvedLicenses

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getInvolvedLicenses()

      • wereAttributesSet

        public boolean wereAttributesSet()

      • updateAttributes

        public void updateAttributes(LicenseDescription newLicense)
        This method calls the several update methods to update the attributes of the current LicenseDescription object.
        Parameters:
        newLicense - - the LicenseDescription object which should update the current license description.

      • updateReusePermission

        private void updateReusePermission(java.lang.String permission)
        This method updates the reusePermission if the given permission is more restrictive. In case the new permission is the most restrictive permission the isReusePermissionMostRestrictive flag is set to true.
        Parameters:
        permission - - a String representation of the new permission value.

      • updateDistributePermission

        private void updateDistributePermission(java.lang.String permission)
        This method updates the distributePermission if the given permission is more restrictive. In case the new permission is the most restrictive permission the isDistributePermissionMostRestrictive flag is set to true.
        Parameters:
        permission - - a String representation of the new permission value.

      • updateEditPermission

        private void updateEditPermission(java.lang.String permission)
        This method updates the EditPermission if the given permission is more restrictive. In case the new permission is the most restrictive permission the isEditPermissionMostRestrictive flag is set to true.
        Parameters:
        permission - - a String representation of the new permission value.

      • updateAttributionRestriction

        private void updateAttributionRestriction(java.lang.String restriction)
        This method updates the AttributionRestriction if the given permission is more restrictive. In case the new restriction is the most restrictive restriction the isAttributionRestrictionMostRestrictive flag is set to true.
        Parameters:
        restriction - - a String representation of the new restriction value.

      • updateSubjectedLicenses

        private void updateSubjectedLicenses(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> newSubjectededLicenses)
        This method iterates every object of the newAddictedLicenses list and append it to the addictedLicenses if it was not already in this list.
        Parameters:
        newSubjectededLicenses - - a List of String objects.
